text.div:
This code system https://openimis.github.io/openimis_fhir_r4_ig/CodeSystem/openimis-identifiers defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
UUID UUID unique identifierThe UUID V4 unique identifier that is generated by the openIMIS Database
Code Unique codeAn identifier issued by the implementer to identify an openIMIS entity

name: OpenIMISIdentifierCS
title: openIMIS Identifiers (All)
description: Identifiers that are specific to openIMIS and could not be found in standard sources.

concept.definition: The UUID V4 unique identifier that is generated by the openIMIS Database
An identifier issued by the implementer to identify an openIMIS entity
